IF(NOT ANDROID)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

IF(NOT EXISTS "C:/Program Files/Android/Android Studio/bin/studio.exe")
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	##DKDOWNLOAD(${DKONLINE}/Tools/android-studio-bundle-143.2915827-windows.exe)
	DKDOWNLOAD(https://dl.google.com/dl/android/studio/install/2.1.2.0/android-studio-bundle-143.2915827-windows.exe)
	DKSETPATH(C:/)
	DKSET(QUEUE_BUILD ON)
	ANDROID_COMMAND(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-studio-bundle-143.2915827-windows.exe)
ENDIF()
